messages.subject: R: [samuraihistory] TV Program - Japanese swords video steaming link
messages.msgSnippet: Can t spoke for Barry, Paul, but this is certainly what *me* was looking for. I met Yoshihara last April 2nd in Turin and I regret very much to be not able to
messages.messageBody:
Can't spoke for Barry, Paul, but this is certainly what *me* was looking
for.
I met Yoshihara last April 2nd in Turin and I regret very much to be not
able to visit this exhibition. Know you if and where catalogues are
available ? I really like Yoshihara's works.
Thanks for sharing.
Carlo-Tsubame

-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com] Per conto di Paul Martin
Inviato: venerd√¨ 22 aprile 2005 5.26
A: token_kenkyu_kai@...
Cc: nihonto@yahoogroups.com; samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Oggetto: [samuraihistory] TV Program - Japanese swords video steaming
link



Hi List

Here is a video streaming link to the recent JATV channel 18 Los angeles

program, featuring The Japanese Sword: The Yoshihara Tradition
exhibition in
Pasadena.

http://www.jatv.net/vfiles/bn/streaming_top.html

It has also been featured in the Asahi shimbun in Japan:

http://mytown.asahi.com/tokyo/news01.asp?kiji=3803

Depending on your PC it may take a couple of attempts, the feature also
continues after the commercial break.

Barry I hope this is what you're looking for.

Best

Paul
